CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 3, 1962, page 3, reads: "Scholarship Awards Group - Judging entries for the four $500 scholarships which The Pittsburgh Courier will present Feb. 25 at the 'Appreciation Day,' at Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall, are (left to right): John Brewer, principal of Miller Street Elementary School; Miss Renee Lichenstein, James E. Burgette, Centre Avenue 'Y' executive; Oscar Schwarm, high official of the Pittsburgh school system; Mrs. Victoria Hargon, director of community services of the Urban League of Pittsburgh, and Dr. Calvin E. Gross, superintendent of the Pittsburgh schools. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Four men and two women seated, including, left to right: John Brewer, Renee Lichenstein, James E. Burgette, Oscar Schwarm, Victoria Hargon, and Dr. Calvin E. Gross, gathered around table in interior with two toned wall and window with blinds and curtains
